content:
# I successfully crafted one Stone Furnace, and my inventory now contains 1 Stone Furnace, 10 coal, and 3 stones. 
# The stone count decreased because 5 stones were used in the crafting process.

# Step 11: Now that I have a Stone Furnace, I will need to place it in the environment to start using it for smelting. 
# I will find a suitable location to place the furnace.

# Locate a suitable position for the Stone Furnace.
furnace_position = find_placeable_position()  # Assuming this function finds a valid location for placing entities.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace_position)  # Place the Stone Furnace at the determined position.
print(f"Placed Stone Furnace at {furnace_position}.")  # Confirm the placement of the furnace.
